DOC.brief_summary: This randomize study ass whether pharmacokinetics new single 750 mg tablet similar 3 x 250 mg tablet ( 750 mg total ) .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Of Lersivirine Single 750 Mg Tablet Versus 3 X 250 Mg Tablets
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 . Total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day 5 halflives local regulation ( whichever longer ) precede first dose study medication . Use prescription nonprescription drug dietary supplement within 7 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior first dose study medication . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 14 drinks/week woman 21 drinks/week men ( 1 drink = 150 mL wine 360 mL beer 45 mL hard liquor ) .
